title: Watch Loop Bug + Critical Error
body:
So earlier this year I submitted a tick for crit errors, was resolved........until not the most recent patch but the patch before. 
Crit errors have come back (roughly 4 times this last week).

Why do these keep appearing?

Also, LoLEsports (Link VIA game: https://watch.lolesports.com/live/lpl/2yv7LGXEWFw) seems to loop from supplied link (Lets call 2 for now) to logout (3) to log in (1) to (2) to (3) to (1) to (2) to (3). Repeat infinitely.
